item.title: Ukraine Dam Collapse Could Lead to Global Food Shortage
item.description: Ukraine Dam Collapse Could Lead to Global Food Shortage A dam in Ukraine collapsed due to Russian shelling, causing a major disruption to food production in the country. The dam collapse is expected to reduce Ukraine’s wheat production by 20%, and could lead to a global wheat shortage.
